original_title: Acting IGP assures security of foreigners in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Acting Inspector General of Police (IGP) Priyantha Weerasooriya stated that the security of all foreigners in the country has been assured and that diplomatic missions have been informed.

He made these comments while addressing a special press conference at the Polonnaruwa SSP’s Office, regarding the security measures taken following information received warning of a possible attack targeting popular tourist locations in the Arugam Bay area.
